Name: Knickerbocker Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Aromatic vermouth dominates but gin botanicals put up a spirited defence in this flavoursome 'medium' Martini.
History: This cocktail first appears in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . For the full story see our Knickerbocker Cocktails page.
Nutrition: One serving of Knickerbocker Martini contains 165 calories
